param.name: trigger_name
param.value: Lack of available memory on server {HOST.NAME}

job.script:
#!/bin/bash
echo "------------------------------------------------------------" echo "Modify trigger in [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST]" echo "Disable target trigger is [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_NAME]" echo "Enable Temporary trigger is [$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_COND]" echo "------------------------------------------------------------"
export Z4J_HOME="/home/scheduler/zbx4jos" cd $Z4J_HOME
# escape[,] in trigger name and trigger cond because of fabric input params must be escaped [,] ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME=`echo "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_NAME" | sed -e "s/,/\\\\\\\,/g"` ESCAPED_TRIGGER_COND=`echo "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_TRIGGER_COND" | sed -e "s/,/\\\\\\\,/g"`
# setting hostid registered in zabbix ZABBIX_HOSTID=`fab gethostid:"$SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST" | head -1` echo "Success of getting zabbix hostid. $SCHEDULER_PARAM_ZABBIX_HOST's zabbix hostid is $ZABBIX_HOSTID"
# setting triggerid disabled by this job SOURCE_TRIGGERID=`fab gettriggerid:hostid=$ZABBIX_HOSTID,msg="$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME" | head -1`
# disable and adding triggers fab trigger_switch:"$ZABBIX_HOSTID","$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME","$ESCAPED_TRIGGER_COND" > /dev/null 2>&1
# setting triggerid adding by zbx4jos DEST_TRIGGERID=`fab gettriggerid:hostid=$ZABBIX_HOSTID,msg="Switched by HyClops_JobMonitoring($ESCAPED_TRIGGER_NAME)" | head -1`
# setting trigger id to JobScheduler's environment file if [ -z "$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SOURCE_TRIGGERID" ]; then echo "SOURCE_TRIGGERID=$SOURCE_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo "DEST_TRIGGERID=$DEST_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES else echo "SOURCE_TRIGGERID=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_SOURCE_TRIGGERID $SOURCE_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES echo "DEST_TRIGGERID=$SCHEDULER_PARAM_DEST_TRIGGERID $DEST_TRIGGERID" >> $SCHEDULER_RETURN_VALUES fi
echo "Disabled trigger id is $SOURCE_TRIGGERID" echo "Enabled trigger id is $DEST_TRIGGERID" echo "Success of trigger switching."
